text: is a Japanese politician. He is a member of the Liberal Democratic Party and the Speaker of the House of Representatives in the Diet (national legislature). ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Speakers of the House of Representatives (Japan) Category:People from Aomori Prefecture Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians Category:Ministers of agriculture, forestry and fisheries of Japan
